pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 29, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kapuskasing, Ontario  

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit with students at l’école secondaire catholique Cité des Jeunes. Remarks and a media availability will follow.

École secondaire catholique Cité des Jeunes
10 Cité des Jeunes Boulevard

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity for the visit with students
    • Open coverage of remarks and media availability
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:45 a.m. via Door O near the main parking lot.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Rayonier Advanced Materials paper mill.

Rayonier Advanced Materials
1 Government Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media must RSVP in advance to media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m. at the main entrance Gate House.
    • Equipment: monopods are permitted, however tripods and ladders are not permitted.
    • Attire: media are asked to arrive with steel toe boots. Additional personal protective equipment will be provided on site.
